articles.title: When you consider the star players on the Lakers: Lebron, Smart, Reaves, Doncic, none of them are on pace for more than 65ish games played
articles.original_title: When you consider the star players on the Lakers: Lebron, Smart, Reaves, Doncic, none of them are on pace for more than 65ish games played
articles.summary: Player | (Games Played) Pace Lebron is on pace for 55 games, Reaves on pace for 43 games, Luka on pace for 64 games Smart on pace for 67 games When you consider how many missed games there are for this Laker team and they are still a solidly top 3-6 western conference team, it's pretty impressive.  If Lebron, Reaves, Smart, and Luka are all healthy in the playoffs, this team might have some real upside.    submitted by    /u/The0ddMan0ut   [link]   [comments]
